Content: But I know a way to fix it
Wanna know how to fix the issue on switch?
First you have to go into settings
You have to make sure there is enough memory wherever you have mc installed
If you have an SD card with mc you should look out if the card has free space
If it's installed into the console storage you should see if it has at least 20 GB of free space
You gotta change some settings if your gonna keep it on system memory
You should find the accessibility option somewhere and change the screen filter
I don't remember if it was on the accessibility tab but you have to change the screen filter
If you can't find them then you should inject your Switch with more energy

Basically_ you need to inject your Switch with enough energy that it will create a black hole. This will transport your mc version into the past_ meaning you'll be able to play an mc version before the lag issue like 1.2 or 1.6
That's the only fox I know
I would put my fix on the website but I don't have a way to post
